010package imagingbook.common.color.iterate;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.util.Random;
014
015/**
016 * Instances of this class create a sequence of random colors.
017 * TODO: Improve randomness (currently not too good, much red ...), modify saturation?.
018 * 
019 * @author WB
020 * @version 2022/04/06
021 *
022 */
023public class RandomHueGenerator implements ColorSequencer {
024        
025        private float h = 0.0f;
026        private float s = 0.9f;
027        private float b = 0.9f;
028        private final Random rnd; 
029
030        /**
031         * Constructor (no random seed).
032         */
033        public RandomHueGenerator() {
034                rnd = new Random();
035        }
036        
037        /**
038         * Constructor (with specific random sees).
039         * @param seed random seed (for repeatability)
040         */
041        public RandomHueGenerator(long seed) {
042                rnd = new Random(seed);
043        }
044        
045        /**
046         * Returns the next random color.
047         */
048        @Override
049        public Color next() {
050                //h = (h + 0.8f + 0.3f * (float)rnd.nextGaussian()) % 1.0f;
051                //h = (float) (h + rnd.nextGaussian()) % 1.0f;
052                h = (h + 0.1f + 0.8f * rnd.nextFloat()) % 1.0f;
053                return Color.getHSBColor(h, s, b); 
054        }
055
056}
